dct:description: A special collection of aggregated columns from the 2021 5-year ACS variables at the census tract level selected for use with the Climate Resilience Academy. Please see the column metadata for the description of the columns.
prov:qualifiedAttribution: direct from source and aggregated according to custom specification, see ETL documentation
prov:action:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/mdc_2021_acs_5yr_tract_cra/{download,etl} && cd /data/mdc_2021_acs_5yr_tract_cra

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1

# download specific variables from the census API, reformat census json to csv,
# and load as individual tables into postGIS with ogr2ogr.
if do_update = 1 then
  wget -O download/total_population.json "https://api.census.gov/data/2021/acs/acs5?
    get=B01001_001E&key=<census api key>&for=tract%3A%2A&in=state%3A12&in=county%3A086"
cols=$(head -n 1 download/total_population.json | awk -F, '{print NF-2}')
awk '{gsub(/\[|\]|.$/,""); print;}' download/total_population.json | 
  sed -e "s/\",\"//2g" -e "s/\"state.*\"/\"geoid\"/1" | 
  ogr2ogr -f PostgreSQL PG:"<postgres_connection>" csv:/vsistdin/ -nln total_population

if do_update = 1 then
  wget -O download/age_17_years_and_younger.json "https://api.census.gov/data/2021/acs/acs5?
    get=B01001_003E%2CB01001_004E%2CB01001_005E%2CB01001_006E%2CB01001_027E%2CB01001_028E%2CB01001_029E%2CB01001_030E&key=<census api key>&for=tract%3A%2A&in=state%3A12&in=county%3A086"
cols=$(head -n 1 download/age_17_years_and_younger.json | awk -F, '{print NF-2}')
awk '{gsub(/\[|\]|.$/,""); print;}' download/age_17_years_and_younger.json | 
  sed -e "s/\",\"//9g" -e "s/\"state.*\"/\"geoid\"/1" |

ALTER TABLE mdc_2021_acs_5yr_tract_cra ADD COLUMN total_population integer;
UPDATE mdc_2021_acs_5yr_tract_cra
  SET total_population = st.agg
  FROM (SELECT geoid, (b01001_001e::integer) AS agg FROM total_population) st 
  WHERE mdc_2021_acs_5yr_tract_cra.geoid = st.geoid;
